questions.answer: Central epithelial thinning with mid-peripheral steepening
questions.explanation: OK redistributes epithelial thickness to flatten the center.

questions.q: Which test best validates the subjective refraction endpoint?
questions.explanation: Balances accommodation to refine the endpoint.

questions.q: Which lens material reduces edge thickness in high minus Rx?
questions.explanation: Higher index reduces edge thickness in minus lenses.

questions.q: Which complaint suggests residual uncorrected cylinder?
questions.explanation: Astigmatism commonly causes ghosting/shadowing.

questions.q: Which is a relative contraindication to corneal refractive surgery?
options: Mild dry eye responsive to tears
questions.explanation: Ectatic disorders are contraindications due to risk of worsening irregularity.
